snippet.title: Norland - Gameplay Overview | Medieval Strategy/City Builder
snippet.description:
Norland is a medieval kingdom sim that generates stories. Manage your noble family and face with class society, crime, slave revolts, religious conflict, economic issues, personal relations, treachery, secret murders, and spectacular battles.

Play the Norland demo during Steam Next Fest. Demo will be available from June 19 at 10:00 AM PDT (UTC-7) to June 26 at 10:00 AM PDT (UTC-7).
 
Wishlist now on Steam at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1857090/Norland/

Official Site: https://www.norlandgame.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/norlandstorysim
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/VBB3CzEHpa

TIMESTAMPS

0:00 Intro
0:26 Noble Family Creator
0:32 Provinces
0:41 City Inhabitants
0:55 Daily Phases
1:09 Money Making Strategies
1:24 Knowledge
1:41 Character Needs
1:52 Religion
2:06 Complex Relationships
2:25 Global Map
2:58 Marriages 
3:30 Building Your Army
4:00 Outro
